name: CIGB-814
notes: NH2 (27 aa APL derived from HSP60). Source: CIGB papers.

name: HSPD1_full
notes: Full-length human 60 kDa heat shock protein 1 (fetch full sequence from UniProt accession P10809).

name: HLA-DRB1 (beta chain)
notes: Common MHC-II beta chain (example allele DRB1*04:01 — fetch allele-specific sequence from IPD-IMGT/HLA or UniProt).

name: HLA-DRA (alpha chain)
notes: Class II MHC alpha chain (fetch full sequence from UniProt P01903).

name: CD4_extracellular
notes: CD4 extracellular domain — relevant as MHC-II co-receptor (fetch full seq from UniProt P01730).

name: TLR4_ectodomain
notes: TLR4 ectodomain (pattern recognition receptor potentially involved in HSP60 signaling).

name: TLR2_ectodomain
notes: TLR2 ectodomain (forms heterodimers with TLR1/6; implicated in HSP60 responses).
